text: Georgi Iliev, nicknamed The Michael (, ) (born 15 September 1956) is a retired Bulgarian footballer and manager. ==Career== In his career, Iliev played for Sliven, CSKA Sofia, Slavia Sofia, Loko Sofia and Dunav Ruse. With CSKA Sofia, he won 4 A PFG titles between 1980 and 1983 and was also Bulgarian Cup holder twice – in 1981 and 1983. Iliev managed the "armymen" from 1990 to 1993. He is also a businessman. Iliev is married to Elizabeth and they have three sons – George, Georg and Georgi.
